security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill that guides Claude in creating generative art. The skill does not execute code at runtime, does not access the filesystem, makes no network calls, and has no command execution capabilities. Static findings are all false positives caused by the scanner misinterpreting documentation text and Apache license boilerplate as security-relevant code. The skill operates entirely through structured prompts that produce self-contained HTML artifacts for user execution in their browser.

content.value_statement: Creating algorithmic art requires specialized knowledge of generative systems, seeded randomness, and p5.js. This skill provides a structured approach to crafting original generative artwork through algorithmic philosophy and interactive parameter exploration.
actual_capabilities: Create original algorithmic philosophies as foundations for generative art
Build interactive p5.js visualizations with seeded randomness for reproducibility
Implement particle systems, flow fields, and emergent behavior patterns
Add parameter controls for real-time exploration of generative aesthetics
Generate self-contained HTML artifacts ready for display in Claude
limitations: Creates static HTML files rather than SVG or vector output
Limited to client-side browser execution via p5.js
Does not provide pre-made art templates or assets

faq.question: What platforms support this skill?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for generating interactive HTML artifacts.

faq.question: What types of algorithms can I create?
faq.answer: Flow fields, particle systems, recursive patterns, noise-based distortions, and emergent behaviors.

faq.question: How does the seed system work?
faq.answer: Uses p5.js randomSeed and noiseSeed to ensure identical output for the same seed value.

faq.question: Is user data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. No file access, network calls, or data collection. Art generates locally in the browser.

faq.question: Why does generated art look different each time?
faq.answer: Each seed produces unique output. Use specific seed values to reproduce exact results.

faq.question: How is this different from static image generators?
faq.answer: Creates interactive HTML artifacts with real-time controls for parameter exploration and modification.
